name: The Road Less Traveled
description:
Hello Employee,

Everyone that comes to visit our little mountain takes the straight path to the lodge. We need tourist to take the other path. We need you to collect the batteries to power the elevators. Each one needs three batteries. Watch for the snow patches. The snow will cause you to slide around. Collect all the batteries to power the entrance to lodge and end your little adventure.

This was made for the Snappy Gurus Game Off - Winter 2023 Game Jam. It is a small and simple game made by me and a colleague. You click where you want the player to move and your goal is collect all of the batteries to reestablish the path. You can also press escape to quit the game.

Game Made By Antonio Martinez & Dominique Woods
